s.title: Software Engineering Intern - Yext
s.description: Yext offers a modern, AI-powered Search Platform that understands natural language so that when people ask questions about a business online they get direct answers – not links.
highlights: Performed QA tasks for a React component library that powers Headless Search integrations, to replace an outdated SDK
Helped with the rebranding of Yext Answers to Search, deprecating npm packages and adding synonyms in repositories.
Worked on developing Yext Studio, a development environment designed for developers and admins to work together on their pages

t.title: Research Intern - ASSIP
t.description: The nationally known Aspiring Scientists Summer Internship Program provides transformative opportunities for high school and undergraduate students. Selected participants work one-on-one with faculty researchers at George Mason University.
highlights: Mentored under Dr. Mihai Boicu, Assistant Professor of Information Technology at GMU
Conducted research on the development of ontology through collective intelligence algorithms
Constructed knowledge graphs using spaCy's NLP models, feeding in text from academic sources in hopes of improving automated course curriculum generation.

u.title: Software Developer - Vytal
u.description: An organization that develops machine learning models to further neuroscience research. We also engineer the devices that can implement said models to advance the field as a whole.
highlights: Developing the mobile and web applications where the deep learning software is integrated
Built a data collection app using React Native, Expo, and Firebase API that collects videos of users’ eyes
Contributing to documentation of progress and milestones through research papers published in reputable journals

v.title: Inspirit AI
v.description: This program, developed and taught exclusively by a team of alumni and graduate students from Stanford, Harvard, and MIT, provides guidance on initiating AI projects, pursuing AI ventures, and preparing for college.

w.title: Director of Technology - COSMOS
w.description: An organization that offers free computer engineering courses, where students learn to combine coding and electrical engineering to create hands-on projects. Students code on Arduino software and build circuits with microcontrollers and other electronic hardware.
highlights: Tasked to redesign the organization’s website as it rebranded
Migrated all content from Wix to Webflow
Implemented a payment system for ordering products and registering for classes

x.title: Classes Director, Mentor, Tech Team - Codefy
x.description: An organization that provides free computer science education for students. We teach a wide variety of subjects, including Java, Python, Machine Learning, Scratch, and Web Development.
highlights: Providing classes in various computer science subjects for 300+ students
Organizing and scheduling 15+ classes through Zoom and Google Classroom
Developed an app to provide weekly competitions for students using React and ExpressJS

y.title: Web Development Intern - dataVediK
y.description: A Houston-based startup focused on sustainable living. It specializes in Big Data, Data Analytics, Machine Learning and end-to-end Data Ecosystems for Energy and healthcare industries.
highlights: Updated the company website using WordPress and WebFlow
Increased user interaction with revamped news, solutions, and careers pages

z.title: Ampersand Professionals
z.description: A robust career-readiness program that includes internship placements, skill-building mentorship, Birkman Career Assessments, and a professional development curriculum with featured experienced industry speakers.
